After a little over a thousand hours into this game, most of which are played as survivor I would say i recommend this game. It will give you everything from laughs to thrills and occasionally anger, but if you enjoy it then you'll just come to expect it and move on. Overall i find it has me coming back for more and maybe it will do the same for you.
This is a very fun horror game.

One of the games which gives a good amount of adrenaline, may it be because the killer runs after you or (on the other hand) you trying to kill the whole team and let no one escape. Even after 152 hours of experience (which is not a lot in this game) you learn and progress  to higher ranks where new challenges await. It might get frustrating after some deaths and loses, but either alone or with friends, it's quite a lot of fun! At the end, it might not be for everyone, but I can recommend it for people who want something fun and challenging to play alone or with friends. In addition, Dead by Daylight offers crossplay which allowed me to play with friends on different consoles even tho I play on PC, and that's why I gifted it to some while it was discounted.

TLDR: Challenging game that I can recommend you to play with friends (+ crossplay) or alone

i would 100% give a yes, this game is great for both survivor and killer but there is one thing i hate and im not going to post a yes until they fix this because this problem has been in this game for years. Every update no matter how small takes hours litteraly hours to download the update might be 100mb but i wait for 2 hours for good knows what. Sometimes and that is more like almost always its faster to just download this game again.i have not talked about gameplay or any other asspect about this game because there is thousands of reviews that did this better than i ever could but i wanted to bring more light to this problem even though it wont do much. peace out i still have probably about an hour until this game launches since they released a 58mb update today.

If you want to play a game where the developers change things on a whim and not because it helps the game in any way, or play a game where you'll find performance issues, lack of gameplay variety and a massive amount of bugs that often times either come back or linger for years on end, and still doesn't feel like it's out of its early access days, then this is the game for you.

However, if you're a sane person and want to spare yourself the trauma that is this game, do yourself a favor, and don't get this game or play it. Trust me, you're saving hours of your precious life playing better games than this, if you can even call Dead by Daylight a "game".

Para arreglar los servidores que andan fatales, los enormes bugs y errores de programacion que segun ellos dicen que le resulta dificil /delicado, el Anti-cheat y sistema de reporte que parece un pozo lleno de mierda. Y la pagina oficial para registrarse y estar al tanto de recompensas y futuras actualizaciones que en cual lleva meses en mantenimiento.

Nice and interesting coorperation game but frequent disconnection. 

Because of the disconnection, penalty time from initial of 4mins to 6hours. For this 2 months, we been playing almost every night, and every night confirm a disconnection. And tonight is record breaking, 6 games disconnected today alone. 

Bravo update.... If this keep on happening, I will make sure quite a number of us switch to other game.

#For the support team, please consider to do something serious about it.

Игра сделана хорошо играю уже давно почти с появления игры но если у вас или у маньяка плохой интернет у будет пинг это пиздец потому что можно оказаться в шкафу и тебя нельзя вытащить игра доставляет удовольствие но если против тебя играет кемпер это пиздец x2 сука стоит вот мразь у тебя перед лицом а спасти тебя никто не может а если ты берёшь фонарик и слепишь мана всё время то ты ебаный токсик ведь ты используешь механнику игры а то что ты сука кемпишь у меня перед ебалом это норм стабильно играю на 10 ранге и таких пидоров всё больше и больше сука

Me parece un gran juego, con infinidad de horas de suspenso y diversión, tanto como killer y superviviente, si juegas como superviviente la comunicación es clave, por eso recomiendo tener al menos 1 amigo dentro de la partida, para poder ver estrategias al momento de querer huir, las perks al comienzo son algo complicadas de entender, pero luego de un tiempo ya familiarizado con el juego, es fácil de comprender que hace cada una, en fin, me parece un gran juego.

I loved the concept of the game, its just the the way its balanced makes it really competitive and salty.
The game's artstyle and OC's are super attractive, they have a very interesting thing going on and i spend hours just looking at the characters in the menu, just looking at them.. its like the thing that brought me there, the style, the concept but actual gameplay makes me wanna stop..

so i don't recommend the game because i should have just looked at it from an outside perspective, i'm more of an horror fan than competition fan, would have loved the survivors to be in 1st person perspective and get jumpscared.. stuff like that, that makes the game really nerve racking.
